Package qlearning

There are several ways to store or compute state/action values.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
Rangement Framework defining methods to store, retrieve, enumerate state/action values.
ValueIteration Every problem where the set of states can be enumerated might implement this interface.
 

Class Summary
Eligibles Memorizing eligibility traces.
Stockage Memorizing Q(s,a) in HashMap.
StockageINT Pour ranger les Q(s,a) entiers
StockageNN Memorizing Q(s,a) in a neural network.
StockageNNSingle Samples are not memorized : each time a new experience is available, the neural network is asked to train.
UniteStockee Acts like a key to store Q(s,a) values.
 

Package qlearning Description

There are several ways to store or compute state/action values.
